description: This world is very different from what you're used to, and &&6there are a lot of new ways to get around.&&r
See below for some helpful keybinds relating to movement.
&&7[Crawl]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6X&&r&&7]&&r to crawl. This will let you fit through one-block gaps.

&&7[Combat Roll]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6R&&r&&7]&&r to roll in the direction of your movement. It will use up some of your hunger bar, but you are invulnerable for half of a second while rolling! There are enchantments to increase your rolling ability and cooldown rate.
There are many other blocks and items to help with movement and traversal as well. Here's some Rope as a reward - take a look through your REI for more.
